title: Weds Post Show (03-30-22)
itunes:title: Weds Post Show (03-30-22)
description:
Bobby gives it .5% that the Will Smith and Chris Rock situation may be an April Fool’s Joke. Why Bobby woke up at 2am and couldn’t go back to sleep. He also reveals a unique situation with his dogs only listening to either him or his wife. Bobby randomly gets a text from a super famous country star. We talk about why there was a TV crew in studio yesterday.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
